import React, { useRef, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import { userContext } from "../../../Context/userProvider"; import handleNum from "../../helpers/handleNum"; const Slide = ({ title }) => { const main = useRef(); let x = 0; const { pros: { proState }, } = useContext(userContext); console.log(proState); useEffect(() => {}); const onLikeProduct = (e) => { e.currentTarget.classList.toggle("product-mark-liked"); }; return ( <>

{title}

constrolSlide(1)} > controlSlide(-1)} >
{proState.length !== 0 && proState.map((item) => (

{item.proName}

{handleNum(item.proPrize)} đ

{handleNum( Math.ceil( parseInt(item.proPrize) - (parseInt( item.proPrize ) * parseInt( item.proPromo )) / 100 ) )} đ

{/* product-mark-liked */} Đã bán 34k
{item.proPromo}%

Yêu Thích

))}
); }; export default Slide;
